name: Free Accountant
author: Alexander N. Shaforostov

sections.description:
Module of conduct of record-keeping on a small enterprise in accordance with the order of Ministry of finance of Russian Federation from 02.07.2010 №66н (in ed. of Order of Минфина to Russia from 17.08.2012 № 113н)
Module the “Free accountant” is development of development of “Open Accountant”
Division ” Reports” complemented by a report “Balance”
The list of the reference books edited by an user is extended the “Fixed assets”, “Low-value tangible assets”, ” Materials”, “Prepared products”
(a division “Tuning”)
Thus, an user has the opportunity to conduct the analytical accounting not only on commodities, contractors and employees but also on materials, prepared products, МБП and OS.
For introduction of the module in Word Press :
– to decompress an archive in wp-content/plugins/FreeAcc
– in the cantilever of WP to activate плагин of “Free Accountant”
– to fill reference books the data

A brief Markdown Example

http://mirbuh.org.ua/marcet/%D0%B1%D1%83%D1%85%D0%B3%D0%B0%D0%BB%D1%82%D0%B5%D1%80%D0%B8%D1%8F/
sections.installation:
For updating of the module it is necessary to replace the file of wp-content/plugins/FreeAcc/fa.js.
Для addition of list of forms of primary documents – to complement the table of fa _ bDoc
sections.faq:
That is needed for work with the module?
To fill reference books data of the enterprise (a division ” Tuning”)

A question that someone might have

Why are not reference books filled?
Every enterprise has the composition of the fixed assets, list of employees, materials, commodities etc.

What about foo bar?

The module is intended for the browsers with supporting HTML5. Realized on vanilla-JS ( without jQuery etc.)
